name: Qaprosoft
description:
Our company provides a full range of software engineering services for mobile startups, emerging companies and leader enterprises. Our core focus is providing special care for each of the clients — our labs will produce ideally fitted solution with use of cutting edge technologies, industry best practices and experience.
Originating from a software Quality Assurance company, we have proven expertise in QA. Meaning, the quality of projects we develop or test always have high standards and are the definition of done.
Our services
- Quality Assurance and Test automation 
- Mobile apps development
- VR/AR systems development
- Data Science and AI
